q2: Which famous player recently left Real Madrid?
a2: Christiano Ronaldo left Real Madrid recently.
q3: Why did he leave Real Madrid?

a4: he left because they did not want to improve the contract
q5: How much of an improvement was he asking for?
a5: He wanted to be on the same level as Messi and Neymar, around 30M
